title: FS T206 Larry Doyle Portrait SGC 4 Centered **Sold**
author: Santo10Fan

posts.post_title: FS T206 Larry Doyle Portrait SGC 4 Centered **Sold**
posts.post_content:
Perfect focus and great centering. This card has a really nice front surface. Slight stain on the back and top left corner likely the only thing holding it back from a 5. Surface resembles what a lot of vintage 6s look like, with T206 dull "gloss" full & prominent.

Sold Paypal FF, (G&S w/fees), Venmo, Zelle. Earliest timestamps on PMs or this thread of "Sold" take precedence.
